title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles up to 2023 that cover topics related to conversational AI, dialogue understanding, and response generation
**"Attention Is All You Need"** - Vaswani et al
Introduces the Transformer model, foundational for many conversational AI systems
Pre-training of Deep Bidirectional Transformers for Language Understanding"** - Devlin et al
Discusses BERT, a model that has significantly influenced dialogue understanding
**"Dialog State Tracking: A Neural Reading Comprehension Approach"** - Gao et al
Explores neural approaches to tracking dialogue states
**"Transferable Multi-Domain State Generator for Task-Oriented Dialogue Systems"** - Wu et al
Focuses on state generation across multiple domains in dialogue systems
**"Towards Empathetic Open-domain Conversation Models: A New Benchmark and Dataset"** - Rashkin et al
Introduces a dataset and benchmark for empathetic dialogue systems
**"Plug and Play Language Models: A Simple Approach to Controlled Text Generation"** - Dathathri et al
Discusses methods for controlled response generation in dialogue systems
Large-Scale Generative Pre-training for Conversational Response Generation"** - Zhang et al
Presents DialoGPT, a model for generating conversational responses
**"A Survey on Dialogue Systems: Recent Advances and New Frontiers"** - Gao et al
Provides a comprehensive overview of recent advances in dialogue systems
**"Towards a Human-like Open-Domain Chatbot"** - Adiwardana et al
Describes the development of Meena, a chatbot designed for open-domain conversations
The Science Behind the Alexa Prize"** - Khatri et al
Details the scientific advancements behind the Alexa Prize competition
**"Learning to Speak and Act in a Fantasy Text Adventure Game"** - Urbanek et al
Explores dialogue systems in the context of interactive fiction games
**"BlenderBot: Towards Building Conversational Agents with a Consistent Personality"** - Roller et al
Discusses BlenderBot, a model designed for consistent personality in conversations
**"Beyond Goldfish Memory: Long-Term Open-Domain Conversation"** - Xu et al
Investigates methods for maintaining context over long conversations
**"Dialogue Natural Language Inference: A New Task for Dialogue Understanding"** - Welleck et al
Introduces a new task for improving dialogue understanding
**"Towards Continual Learning for Conversational Agents"** - Madotto et al
Examines approaches for continual learning in dialogue systems
**"The Role of Pragmatics in Dialogue Understanding"** - Jurafsky et al
Discusses the importance of pragmatics in understanding dialogue
**"Conversational Agents for Mental Health: A Review"** - Inkster et al
Reviews the use of conversational agents in mental health applications
**"Evaluating the Performance of Conversational AI: Metrics and Benchmarks"** - Deriu et al
Provides an overview of evaluation metrics for conversational AI
**"Dialogue Systems in the Wild: Challenges and Opportunities"** - Henderson et al
Discusses real-world challenges and opportunities for dialogue systems
**"Advancements in Multimodal Dialogue Systems"** - Baltrusaitis et al
Explores the integration of multimodal inputs in dialogue systems
These articles cover a range of foundational models, recent advancements, and specific applications in the field of conversational AI
